Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Leviathan Drive in the southeastern section of town.
Room.LongDescription: Leviathan Drive continues to the north and south, being one of the only roads in town that you can travel on and get from the north to the south city walls without leaving the road. On the east, you can see the Holy Order of the White Rose, the entrance to which is located to the north. On the west side of the road is the Chateau Richland Winery, where all varieties of wines may be purchased.
